title: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, July 17, 2013
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, July 17, 2013
teaser: A grim innovation from Greece: the slow-motion layoff. Nearly twelve years since September 11, the developer of the World Trade Center is still going after airlines, airports and even the airplanes that brought down the Twin Towers. And why women stay in jobs longer than they should.
byline: Bruce Johnson, Karen Clark, Ashley Milne-Tyte, Stan Alcorn, Raghu Manavalan, Molly Wood, Chris Morris, Allan Sloan, Sam Beard, Queena Kim and David Brancaccio
description: A grim innovation from Greece: the slow-motion layoff. Nearly twelve years since September 11, the developer of the World Trade Center is still going after airlines, airports and even the airplanes that brought down the Twin Towers. And why women stay in jobs longer than they should.
